page.title: 07HOUSES
page.content: There are 8 C18 semi-detached clay- lump,tiled roof{cottages.}3 earlier houses,very heavily beamed,1 detached cottage.Due to land being sold to larger farming units,{farmhouses}are becoming private residences.There are 6 of these.Increased renovation of old buildings:2 barns converted to houses, 1 public house now private.There are 20 brickbuilt detached{bungalows}about 15-20 years old.10 years ago 19 semi- detached bungalows were built & 6 det- ached family bungalows,all privately owned.There is 1 holiday-let cottage. The Council built 16 houses between 1939 & 1946.All houses have gardens with lawns,flower-beds,trees,shrubs & vegetables;the larger houses tend to have more land,average 2 acres.No new {building}sites are available,only infill on the site of previous dwellings allowed.
